name: probabilistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is based on or relates to how likely it is that something will happen : Humans do not think probabilistically, especially at the upper and lower ends of the probability scale. Complex systems always have a degree of non-predictability, so we have to think about these things probabilistically.
More examplesFewer examplesSome parts of the uncertainty may be difficult to estimate probabilistically. Replication of the enormous amount of data contained within the DNA of living cells will probabilistically result in some errors (called mutations).
